name: 蔡明誠
objective:
本課程希望能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。微積分 (二) 課程內容包括：
6. 積分的技巧，7. 積分的應用，8. 級數，9. 參數方程式和極座標，10. 向量和幾何空間，
 11. 偏導數，12. 重積分。 

This course aims at developing comprehension of derivation and integral、activating capabilities of logic inference and induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content of Calculus (II)
includes: 6.Techniques of integration  7.Applications of integration 8. Series 9.Parametric equations and polar coordinates 10.Geometry of space 11.Partial derivatives 12.Multiple integrals
schedule:

Week 7-9 : Chapter 9.Parametric equations and polar coordinates 
Week 10-11 : Chapter 10: Geometry of Space
Week 12-14 : Chapter 11.Partial derivatives
Week 15-17  : Chapter 12.Multiple integrals
Week 18 : Final exam
